sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive (NYSE: RSI) wins EGR North LatAm Operator of the Year title
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive (NYSE: RSI) was awarded Operator of the Year – North LatAm (Colombia and Peru) at the EGR LatAm Awards on December 1, 2025. This recognition highlights RSI's commercial success, innovation, and customer experience in the Colombian and Peruvian markets, following its expansion into Peru in 2024 and established presence in Colombia since 2018. The award underscores RSI's commitment to localized products and services in the rapidly developing Latin American market.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive Named Operator of the Year - North LatAm at Inaugural EGR LatAm Awards
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive (RSI) has been awarded "Operator of the Year – North LatAm" at the inaugural EGR LatAm Awards for its achievements in the Colombian and Peruvian online gaming markets. The award recognizes RSI's innovative gaming experiences, customer service, and successful expansion, particularly with its RushBet brand in Peru. RSI focuses on localized and customized gaming products to cater to regional player preferences and has received numerous accolades for its operational excellence and customer service.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive Named Operator of the Year-North LatAm at the EGR LatAm Awards
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive (RSI) has been awarded Operator of the Year – North LatAm at the inaugural EGR LatAm Awards for its outstanding performance in the Colombian and Peruvian markets. This recognition highlights RSI's significant growth and its commitment to delivering innovative, localized gaming experiences and excellent customer service in Latin America. The company expanded its RushBet brand into Peru in 2024, reinforcing its regional leadership.

feed.title: Ten Straight Quarters of Revenue Growth Could Be a Game Changer For Rush Street Interactive (RSI)

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive, Inc. Promotes Kyle Sauers to President - MarketScreener
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive, Inc. announced the promotion of Kyle Sauers to President, in addition to his current role as Chief Financial Officer, effective October 15, 2025. Sauers, who joined RSI in 2020, will expand his responsibilities to include broader day-to-day operations and cross-functional performance while continuing to lead financial strategy. This promotion recognizes his significant contributions to building RSI's finance organization and guiding strategic growth.

feed.title: RUSH STREET INTERACTIVE AND BURRAPAY SIGN CRYPTOCURRENCY PAYMENTS AGREEMENT
feed.summary: BurraPay and Rush Street Interactive (NYSE: RSI) have signed an agreement to integrate cryptocurrency payment solutions into RSI's BetRivers gaming platform. This partnership aims to provide compliant and player-friendly crypto payment options for online gaming, rolling out jurisdiction by jurisdiction pending regulatory approvals. The collaboration highlights a significant step in combining regulated online gaming with digital payments across North America.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive CEO Schwartz sells $4 million in stock
feed.summary: Richard Todd Schwartz, CEO of Rush Street Interactive (NYSE:RSI), sold 193,905 shares of Class A Common Stock for approximately $4 million on September 8th and 9th, executed under a pre-arranged 10b5-1 plan. This insider sale comes as the company's stock has seen a significant surge and maintains strong financial health, according to InvestingPro analysis, despite high volatility and a substantial P/E ratio. The sale followed a strong Q2 2025 earnings report, outperforming expectations, and positive analyst target revisions.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive brings in Shubham Tyagi as CTO
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive (RSI) has appointed Shubham Tyagi as its new Chief Technology Officer (CTO). Tyagi, who previously led global engineering and operations teams at Warner Bros. Discovery – Sports, will be responsible for advancing RSI’s technology capabilities and innovation in online gaming. His appointment is expected to strengthen RSI's commitment to delivering advanced player-first experiences.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive Reports Record Quarterly Revenue of $269 Million and Raises 2025 Financial Guidance
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive (RSI) announced record-breaking financial results for Q2 2025, with revenues reaching $269 million, a 22% year-over-year increase, and a net income of $29 million. The company's adjusted EBITDA surged by 88% to over $40 million, driven by strong growth in online casino and sports betting in both North America and Latin America. RSI has consequently raised its full-year 2025 revenue guidance to between $1.05 billion and $1.1 billion and its adjusted EBITDA guidance to between $133 million and $147 million.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive Earnings: What To Look For From RSI
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive (NYSE:RSI) is set to announce its earnings results this Wednesday. Analysts anticipate revenue to grow by 13.5% year-on-year to $250.2 million, with adjusted earnings projected at $0.06 per share. The company has consistently surpassed revenue estimates over the past two years and is trading with positive investor sentiment in the consumer discretionary segment.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive, Inc. (NYSE:RSI) Q1 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
feed.summary: This article provides the Q1 2025 earnings call transcript for Rush Street Interactive, Inc. (NYSE:RSI). It details the financial performance and discussions held during the investor call regarding the company's first-quarter results.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive Debuts PropPacks for NBA Parlays
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive (RSI) has launched "PropPacks" for NBA same-game parlays on its BetRivers Sportsbook. This new digital game offers bettors collectible player cards with potential bonus credit payouts, aiming to boost engagement during the NBA season. The initiative combines the popularity of sports cards with sports wagering, offering various prize tiers based on player point totals.

feed.title: Infront makes “significant strides” with data platform ahead of ITF partnership launch
feed.summary: Infront Bettor has made significant progress with its data platform in anticipation of its 2025 partnership launch with the International Tennis Federation (ITF). This includes new agreements with Rush Street Interactive (NYSE:RSI) and an extended deal with bet365, alongside plans to boost streaming production and enhance data collection for ITF tournament matches. The company also secured a five-year partnership with France’s Ligue de Football Professionnel (LFP) in 2023.

feed.title: Rush Street Interactive Expands Latin American Presence as It Opens Two New State-of-Art Offices in Colombia
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive (RSI) has expanded its Latin American presence by opening two new state-of-the-art offices in Bogota and Medellin, Colombia. The Bogota office will serve as the headquarters for Latin American operations, while the Medellin office will be a technology hub. This move supports RSI's continued growth of its RushBet brand in the region and its strategy to attract top talent.

feed.title: Bob McCown joins BetRivers as brand ambassador
feed.summary: Legendary Canadian sportscaster Bob McCown has signed a multi-year deal as a brand ambassador with BetRivers, part of Chicago-based online sportsbook Rush Street Interactive. This partnership includes appearing in commercials, creating exclusive content for the BetRivers Network, and hosting The Bob McCown Podcast on the network. He joins other former Canadian sports media personalities like Dan O’Toole and Natasha Staniszewski who have also become brand ambassadors for BetRivers.

feed.title: RUSH STREET INTERACTIVE NAMED OPERATOR OF THE YEAR, CUSTOMER SERVICE OPERATOR OF THE YEAR AND SOCIAL GAMING OPERATOR OF THE YEAR AT EGR NORTH AMERICA AWARDS 2022
feed.summary: Rush Street Interactive (RSI) won three prestigious awards at the EGR North America Awards 2022: Operator of the Year, Customer Service Operator of the Year, and Social Gaming Operator of the Year. The awards recognize RSI's significant growth, player retention, innovative offerings, and exceptional customer service, particularly its consistent win for Customer Service Operator of the Year. RSI continues to expand its presence, operating in 13 U.S. states and having recently launched in Canada.
